name: The 11th Hour: The Sequel to The 7th Guest
name_original: The 11th Hour: The Sequel to The 7th Guest
description:
The 11th Hour: The Sequel to The 7th Guest is an adventure-puzzle game developed by Trilobyte. It was originally released in 1995. Virgin Interactive Entertainment published the game.
The 11th Hour: The Sequel to The 7th Guest is available on PC.
